assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Indowind Energy Limited operates as an IPP in the renewable energy sector in India. It engages in developing, setting up, operating, and maintaining wind farms primarily in Tamil Nadu and Karnataka. The company sells its wind power to corporate clients. It also provides project management and asset management services, as well as trades in and sells carbon credits (CERs) in Indian and international CER markets. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Chennai, India.
